Uses of Package
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.listeners

  • Packages that use org.cloudbus.cloudsim.listeners 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.builders  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.listeners  
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.listeners used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim 
    Class and Description
    CloudletInsideVmEventInfo
    An EventInfo class that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events of a Cloudlet that happened inside a given Vm.
    EventListener
    An interface to define observer objects that listen to specific changes in the state of a given observable object, also called subject.
    HostUpdatesVmsProcessingEventInfo
    An EventInfo class that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified when a Host updates the processing of all its VMs.
    VmInsideDatacenterEventInfo
    An EventInfo class that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events of a Vm that happened inside a given Datacenter.
    VmInsideHostEventInfo
    An EventInfo class that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events of a Vm that happened inside a given Host.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.listeners used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.builders 
    Class and Description
    CloudletInsideVmEventInfo
    An EventInfo class that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events of a Cloudlet that happened inside a given Vm.
    EventListener
    An interface to define observer objects that listen to specific changes in the state of a given observable object, also called subject.
    HostUpdatesVmsProcessingEventInfo
    An EventInfo class that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified when a Host updates the processing of all its VMs.
    VmInsideDatacenterEventInfo
    An EventInfo class that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events of a Vm that happened inside a given Datacenter.
    VmInsideHostEventInfo
    An EventInfo class that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events of a Vm that happened inside a given Host.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.listeners used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core 
    Class and Description
    EventInfo
    An interface which defines the basic methods that an object representing data about a happened event must have.
    EventListener
    An interface to define observer objects that listen to specific changes in the state of a given observable object, also called subject.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.listeners used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.listeners 
    Class and Description
    CloudletEventInfo
    An EventInfo interface that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events happened for a given Cloudlet.
    CloudletEventInfoSimple
    A basic implementation of the CloudletEventInfo interface.
    DatacenterEventInfo
    An EventInfo interface that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events happened for a given Datacenter.
    EventInfo
    An interface which defines the basic methods that an object representing data about a happened event must have.
    EventInfoAbstract
    An abstract class to that implements the basic methods of the EventInfo interface.
    EventListener
    An interface to define observer objects that listen to specific changes in the state of a given observable object, also called subject.
    HostEventInfo
    An EventInfo interface that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events of a given Host.
    HostEventInfoSimple
    A basic implementation of the HostEventInfo interface.
    VmEventInfo
    An EventInfo interface that stores data to be passed to EventListener objects that are registered to be notified about events happened for a given Vm.
    VmEventInfoSimple
    A basic implementation of the VmEventInfo interface.
